metric.name: GRBM_COUNT
metric.descr: Tie High - Count Number of Clocks

metric.name: GRBM_GUI_ACTIVE
metric.descr: The GUI is Active

metric.name: SQ_WAVES
metric.descr: Count number of waves sent to SQs. (per-simd, emulated, global)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU
metric.descr: Number of VALU instructions issued. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VMEM_WR
metric.descr: Number of VMEM write instructions issued (including FLAT). (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VMEM_RD
metric.descr: Number of VMEM read instructions issued (including FLAT). (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_SALU
metric.descr: Number of SALU instructions issued. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_SMEM
metric.descr: Number of SMEM instructions issued. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_FLAT
metric.descr: Number of FLAT instructions issued. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_FLAT_LDS_ONLY
metric.descr: Number of FLAT instructions issued that read/wrote only from/to LDS (only works if EARLY_TA_DONE is enabled). (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_LDS
metric.descr: Number of LDS instructions issued (including FLAT). (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_GDS
metric.descr: Number of GDS instructions issued. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_WAIT_INST_LDS
metric.descr: Number of wave-cycles spent waiting for LDS instruction issue. In units of 4 cycles. (per-simd, nondeterministic)

metric.name: SQ_ACTIVE_INST_VALU
metric.descr: Number of cycles the SQ instruction arbiter is working on a VALU instruction. (per-simd, nondeterministic). Units in quad-cycles(4 cycles)

metric.name: SQ_INST_CYCLES_SALU
metric.descr: Number of cycles needed to execute non-memory read scalar operations. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_THREAD_CYCLES_VALU
metric.descr: Number of thread-cycles used to execute VALU operations (similar to INST_CYCLES_VALU but multiplied by # of active threads). (per-simd)

metric.name: SQ_LDS_BANK_CONFLICT
metric.descr: Number of cycles LDS is stalled by bank conflicts. (emulated)

metric.name: TA_TA_BUSY
metric.descr: TA block is busy. Perf_Windowing not supported for this counter.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_READ_WAVEFRONTS
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode reads processed by the TA.

metric.name: TA_FLAT_WRITE_WAVEFRONTS
metric.descr: Number of flat opcode writes processed by the TA.

metric.name: TCC_HIT
metric.descr: Number of cache hits.

metric.name: TCC_MISS
metric.descr: Number of cache misses. UC reads count as misses.

metric.name: TCC_MC_RDREQ
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte reads. The hardware actually does 64-byte reads but the number is adjusted to provide uniformity.

metric.name: TCC_MC_WRREQ
metric.descr: Number of 32-byte transactions going over the TC_MC_wrreq interface. Atomics may travel over the same interface and are generally classified as write requests.

metric.name: TCC_MC_WRREQ_STALL
metric.descr: Number of cycles a write request was stalled.

metric.name: TCP_TCP_TA_DATA_STALL_CYCLES
metric.descr: TCP stalls TA data interface. Now Windowed.
